channel.title: CVE Feed for LA-Studio -- LA-Studio Element Kit for Elementor
channel.description: The latest CVEs for LA-Studio -- LA-Studio Element Kit for Elementor

item.title: CVE-2024-37479|2024-07-02T07:40:08.888Z -- la-studio -- la-studio%20element%20kit%20for%20elementor
item.description: Local File Inclusion vulnerability in LA-Studio LA-Studio Element Kit for Elementor via "LaStudioKit Progress Bar" widget in New Post, specifically in the "progress_type" attribute.This issue affects LA-Studio Element Kit for Elementor: from n/a through 1.3.8.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-35725|2024-06-10T13:16:08.172Z -- la-studio -- la-studio%20element%20kit%20for%20elementor
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in LA-Studio LA-Studio Element Kit for Elementor.This issue affects LA-Studio Element Kit for Elementor: from n/a through 1.3.6.
